changelog: CRITICAL: Intelligent voice matching - prevents 'sailing' for 'saline'
Voice search now restricted to valid equipment names only
NEW: Voice search auto-speaks results instantly
NEW: Cancel button (X) next to microphone during listening
FIXED: Updated equipment images with better video frames
IMPROVED: Levenshtein distance algorithm for fuzzy matching
IMPROVED: PWA manifest for better Android support
Equipment images extracted at exact transcript timestamps
Voice matching uses phonetic similarity scoring
Cancel button appears only when listening
